Solution: The opposite of an area of extreme interest would be an area of disinterest. Here, the opposite is a lack of interest or excitement.

Solution: The opposite of an area of high pressure in weather patterns would be an area of low pressure. Low-pressure systems typically bring wet and stormy weather.
